desserts.name: Chocolate Cake
desserts.description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake, perfect for any occasion.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt.
Add the eggs, milk, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
Add the hot water and mix until the batter is smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
Allow the cake to cool before frosting and serving.

desserts.name: Apple Pie
desserts.description: A classic apple pie with a flaky crust and sweet, cinnamon-spiced filling.
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9-inch double crust pie
8 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F.
Peel and slice the apples and toss with sugar, cinnamon, and flour.
Roll out the pie crust and place one in the bottom of a 9-inch pie dish.
Add the apple filling to the crust and dot with butter.
Roll out the second pie crust and place on top of the filling, crimping the edges to seal.
Cut a few slits in the top crust to allow steam to escape.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown

desserts.name: Strawberry Shortcake
desserts.description: A light and fluffy sponge cake layered with sweet strawberries and whipped cream.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Add the eggs, milk, butter, and vanilla extract to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
Pour the batter into two greased 9-inch cake pans and bake for 20-25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
Allow the cakes to cool before assembling the shortcake.
To assemble, place one cake on a plate and top with sliced strawberries and whipped cream.
Place the second cake on top and repeat with more strawberries and whipped cream.
Serve immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.

desserts.name: Banana Bread
desserts.description: A moist and flavorful bread made with ripe bananas and warm spices.
ingredients: 1 cup mashed ripe bananas (about 2 medium bananas)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F.
In a medium mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
In a large mixing bowl, cream together the sugar and butter until light and fluffy.
Add the eggs one at a time, mixing

desserts.name: Red Velvet Cupcakes
desserts.description: Moist and fluffy red velvet cupcakes topped with cream cheese frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Line a cupcake pan with paper liners.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cocoa powder.
In a separate bowl, whisk together oil, buttermilk, eggs, red food coloring, vanilla extract, and vinegar.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Fill each cupcake liner about 2/3 full with batter.
Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a cupcake comes out clean.
Let cool completely before frosting.
To make the frosting, beat cream cheese and butter together until smooth.
Add powdered sugar and vanilla extract and beat until fluffy.
Pipe or spread frosting onto cooled cupcakes.

desserts.name: Glazed Donuts
desserts.description: Classic fried donuts with a sweet glaze.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and nutmeg.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, melted butter, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Cover and chill dough for 30 minutes.
On a lightly floured surface, roll out dough to 1/2 inch thickness.
Use a donut cutter to cut out donuts.
Fill a large, heavy-bottomed pot with oil and heat to 375°F.
Fry donuts in batches until golden brown, about 1-2 minutes per side.
Remove donuts with a slotted spoon and let drain on paper towels.
To make the glaze, whisk together powdered sugar, milk, and vanilla extract until smooth.
Dip each donut in glaze and let dry on a wire rack.

desserts.name: Classic Tiramisu
desserts.description: A traditional Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: In a medium saucepan, whisk together egg yolks and sugar until well blended. Whisk in milk and cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and coats the back of a spoon. Remove from heat and let cool.
In a large bowl, beat heavy cream with vanilla until soft peaks form. Add mascarpone cheese and beat until smooth.
In a small bowl, combine coffee and rum. Dip each ladyfinger into the coffee mixture, soaking them briefly on both sides, and layer them on the bottom of a 9x13 inch dish.
Spread half of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers, then repeat with another layer of soaked ladyfingers and remaining mascarpone mixture.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight.
Before serving, sprinkle cocoa powder over the top of the tiramisu.
Enjoy!
